data.text: Divai en jajaro to kongʼo en koko;
Mirimb ruoth chalo gi ruto mar sibuor;
Enobed luor maduongʼ ne ngʼatno ma dagi dhawo,
Jasamuoyo ok pur puothe e kinde mowinjore;
Dwaro mar chuny dhano chalo gi pi matut,
Ji mangʼeny wacho ni gin gihera ma adiera;
Ngʼat makare nigi ngima ma ok ocha;
Ka ruoth obedo e kome mondo ongʼad bura;
En ngʼa manyalo wacho niya, “Aserito chunya maler;
Rapim ma ok nikare gi pimo ma ok kare,
Kata mana nyathi ingʼeyo gi timbene,
It mawinjo gi wangʼ maneno,
Kik iher nindo nono to ibiro bedo jachan,
Jangʼiewo wacho niya, “Ok ber ngangʼ, ok ber ngangʼ!”
Dhahabu nitie, kendo kite ma nengogi tek bende nitie mogundho,
Kaw law ngʼat mochungʼne ngʼat mokia kaka singo;
Chiemo moyud e yo ma ok kare mit ne ngʼato,
Los chenro ka ikonyori gi ngʼado rieko;
Fuongʼo wach ketho genruok;
Ka ngʼato okwongʼo wuon mare kata min mare,
Mwandu moyud motelo e yo mayot
Kik iwach niya, “Abiro chulo kuor kuom rachni motimna!”
Jehova Nyasaye mon gi rapim mag miriambo,
Okange mag ngʼato ichiko gi Jehova Nyasaye.
En obadho ne ngʼato masingo gimoro ka ok oparo,
Ruoth mariek riembo joma timbegi richo;
Taya mar Jehova Nyasaye manyo chuny dhano,
Hera kod adiera miyo ruoth bedo gi kwe,
Sunga ma yawuowi nigo e teko margi,
Goch kod adhonde pwodho richo,
